actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for each of 10 vessels, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation: (1) for employment in the coastwise trade for each of ten named vessels; and (2) for employment in the coastwise trade and on the Great Lakes and their tributary and connecting waters in trade with Canada for one named vessel.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for each of 10 vessels, and for other purposes.
